column4: it has this shaded grey borders on any application i open.if i remove enlightenment using synaptic , and relogin gnomedoes no start ,only a terminal window
i have 4 GB memory but ubuntu is only seeing 3GB via top ,is this normal and how do i fix this .also what is th recommendation as far as swap is concerned
i dont think u will need any swap
im not sure y it would only see 3gb of memory but with that 2x reccomendation is meant for ppl with lik 128mb o ram
